frameset.edef: to attend or show up to work

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS حضر) (PP-DIR (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجامعة))) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الطلاب) (ADJ المطرودون)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاساتذة) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الموظفين)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذين)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP داوموا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-MNR (PREP ك) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN العادة))))))))) (PUNC .))
